entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
